requestParams.description: Bonalu is a vibrant, annual Hindu festival celebrated in Telangana, primarily in Hyderabad and Secunderabad, to honor Goddess Mahakali. It's a month-long festival, typically occurring in July/August (Ashada Masam), where women prepare and offer 'Bonam,' a traditional meal, to the goddess. The festival is a form of thanksgiving for fulfilled vows and a celebration of the goddess's power.
